docs.lead_paragraph: Oracle dealt a blow Wednesday to its longtime ally Sun Microsystems by "entering the hardware business" in tandem with Hewlett-Packard.
docs.abstract: Oracle has teamed with Hewlett-Packard, rather than traditional partners Sun and Dell, on new data warehousing hardware.

docs.lead_paragraph: SAUSAGE fans in southeastern Connecticut feel fortunate to live where they do, near Westerly, R.I. That is because the city, which is just across the Pawcatuck River, is considered the world capital of soupy: a peppery, dry-cured sausage first produced by people who moved to Westerly from Calabria, Italy, around 1900 to work in the quarries and the factories. Their descendants -- and many others -- continue to make it today.
docs.abstract: Article on soupy, peppery, dry-cured sausage native to Calabria, Italy; Westerly, RI, Italian-American community continues to make it each winter; photos (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: A soda-pop machine hunkers in front of the Olympia Dairy and Bakery in Columbus, Ind. Across the front of the machine is a large photo of Tony Stewart, who has become a famous stock car driver for driving hard into the corners and for refusing to veer from controversy. There are many soda-pop machines bearing large photos of Stewart, particularly at Home Depot, the national group of home-improvement stores, which sponsors his orange No. 20 Pontiac. What made this machine particularly interesting to Stewart was that he went to Columbus North High School across the street, and used to hang out at Olympia Dairy and Bakery.
docs.abstract: Article discusses recent controversial actions of auto racing driver Tony Stewart that has him placed on probation by Nascar; photo (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: The process of testing can deepen learning.
docs.abstract: News analysis; research supports those parents and teachers protesting standardized testing increasingly common in schools across nation; experiments show that giving students tests of varying length and intensity, going beyond just basic assessment, can deepen learning experience and create more deeply embedded memories of subject matter.
docs.snippet: The process of testing can deepen learning....
